name: Desperate Strength
description: In times of great trauma, desperate people have displayed amazing feats of strength and endurance. With a burst of adrenaline, a mother can lift a truck off a pinned child, or a father may smash through a wall to save his family. Through strength of will, a werebear may channel that same desperate energy. A bear-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Healing Tongue
description: The Gurahl is able to heal the wounds of any living creature, aggravated or otherwise, simply by licking the afflicted area. The Gurahl may not heal herself, spirits or the undead with this Gift. A bear- or unicorn-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Herb Call
description: The Gurahl can call nearby herbs to her aid, causing them to grow rapidly and move toward her. A plant-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Mask of the Bear Spirit
description: The Gurahl can take on certain ursine features while in homid form, becoming more intimidating. An ancestor-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Salmon Leap
description: Like the mighty salmon swimming upstream, the Gurahl can leap great distances. A salmon-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Strength of Purpose
description: The Gurahl's determination becomes unshakeable, allowing her to resist attempts to control her mind or change her course of action. An ancestor-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Beneath the Surface
description: The Gurahl can sense the true emotional state of others, piercing through deception and facades. A bear-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Burning Blood
description: The Gurahl's blood becomes caustic to her enemies, burning them when they draw it. A fire-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Hibernation
description: The Gurahl can enter a deep sleep that allows rapid healing and requires little sustenance. A bear-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Mother's Touch
description: The Gurahl can heal diseases and restore lost limbs through their healing powers. A unicorn-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Slumber
description: The Gurahl can cause others to fall into a deep sleep. A bear-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Territory
description: The Gurahl can claim an area as their territory, gaining various benefits within it. An ancestor-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Attunement
description: The Gurahl can commune with the spirits of an area to gain information about it. Any nature spirit can teach this Gift.

name: Curse of the Bear
description: The Gurahl can curse enemies with bad luck and misfortune. An ancestor-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Healing Sleep
description: The Gurahl can place others in a healing trance that accelerates their natural recovery. A bear-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Rage of the Bear
description: The Gurahl channels the legendary fury of the bear, becoming a terrifying force of destruction. A bear-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Restore the Land
description: The Gurahl can heal damage done to the natural environment. A Gaia spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Ancestral Incarnation
description: The Gurahl can channel the power and wisdom of their ancestors. An ancestor-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Gift of the Bear Mother
description: The Gurahl gains tremendous healing abilities, able to cure almost any ailment. The Bear Mother herself teaches this Gift.

name: Strength of the Bear
description: The Gurahl gains supernatural strength, becoming as mighty as the greatest bears. A bear-spirit teaches this Gift.

name: Gaia's Vengeance
description: The Gurahl becomes an avatar of Gaia's wrath, gaining tremendous power to punish those who harm the Earth. Gaia herself teaches this Gift.

name: Gift of the Spirit Bear
description: The Gurahl transforms into a mighty spirit bear, gaining tremendous power and the ability to fight spirits directly. The most powerful bear-spirits teach this Gift.

name: Revival
description: The Gurahl can bring the recently dead back to life, though at great cost to themselves. The Bear Mother herself teaches this Gift.
